directions: Combine onion, tomato, olive oil, lime juice, salt, pepper, and cayenne in a bowl. Let sit 3 to 5 minutes. Add crispy rice cereal and serve immediately.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
1 cup crispy rice cereal (such as Rice Krispies®)
title: Redneck Bhelpuri
